name: WebsiteReader
0:
”Alexa, open website reader”
”Alexa, ask website reader to read ndtv”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: website reader
des: Website Reader will read top 5 feeds from the website/blog for you. Specially designed for vision impaired people to listen website/blog content, the website must have rss/atom feeds. Just say the name of the website. To invoke say "Alexa, ask website reader to read New York Times". If no domain is specified then .com domain will be appended.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
